com.opera.core.systems.testing.drivers

Class TestDriverBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opera.core.systems.testing.drivers.TestDriverBuilder

  • public class TestDriverBuilder
extends Object
    TestDriverBuilder is a builder that supplies you with instances of TestDriver through the get() method. You can either use it by specifying a Supplier class or the class it self as a construction argument. Call get() to instantiate a new driver. The Supplier class supplies objects of a single type. Semantically that could be factories, generators, builders, closures, or something else entirely.
    Author:
    Andreas Tolf Tolfsen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestDriverBuilder()
      By default, this class provides a plain TestOperaDriver instance object with the default capabilities.
      TestDriverBuilder(Class<? extends TestDriver> driverImplementation)
      You may build a new Opera instance by specifying a custom driver class.
      TestDriverBuilder(TestDriverSupplier supplier)
      You may build a new Opera instance by specifying an implementation of the Supplier interface.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestDriverBuilder

        public TestDriverBuilder()
        By default, this class provides a plain TestOperaDriver instance object with the default capabilities.

      • TestDriverBuilder

        public TestDriverBuilder(TestDriverSupplier supplier)
        You may build a new Opera instance by specifying an implementation of the Supplier interface. The supplier may, for instance, perform pre- or post startup steps needed for a custom driver configuration.
        Parameters:
        supplier - a supplier that implements Supplier#get()

      • TestDriverBuilder

        public TestDriverBuilder(Class<? extends TestDriver> driverImplementation)
        You may build a new Opera instance by specifying a custom driver class. The class must extend the TestDriver interface.
        Parameters:
        driverImplementation - class reference to driver implementation

    • Method Detail

      • using

        public TestDriverBuilder using(OperaSettings settings)
        Allows you to specify using which capabilities you'd like the driver to be instantiated with.
        Parameters:
        settings - capabilities for the driver
        Returns:
        a self reference

      • modifyLogLevel

        public TestDriverBuilder modifyLogLevel(Level level)
        Allows you to override the logging levels specified in the capabilities.
        Parameters:
        level - the logging level you wish the driver to use
        Returns:
        a self reference

      • get

        public TestDriver get()
        Retrieves an instance.
        Returns:
        an instance of TestDriver
